GSD.product_version: versions from v5.15 to before v5.15.61
GSD.description:
ksmbd: fix use-after-free bug in smb2_tree_disconect

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.61 by commit a54c509c32adba9d136f2b9d6a075e8cae1b6d27, it was introduced in version v5.15 by commit e2f34481b24db2fd634b5edb0a5bd0e4d38cc6e9. For more details please see the references link.
